<details><summary>[+] <i>Legend & explanation </i></summary>

<img src="img/eGRN_legend.png" width="50%"/> 

The eGRNs were built based on consistent TF expression and motif enrichment on cell-type specific regions (see the paper for details).

The **data** behind these eGRNs (and the **remaining cell types**, which are not plotted) can be explored in the section *"Network tables"* and is also available for *download*. 

Updated (version): Aug. 2021

</details>
